body_html:
Or can be fixed even simpler by changing to:

output[i].copy_(recv_buffer.select(0, i));

This I got from the removed Tensor operator[](int64_t idx) const; operator. I don't know, which fix is better.
body:
Or can be fixed even simpler by changing to:

```
output[i].copy_(recv_buffer.select(0, i));
```

This I got from the removed `Tensor operator[](int64_t idx) const;` operator. I don't know, which fix is better.
